features: 【Broad Compatibility】The phone holder fits for 3.5 to 7 in cellphones with screen size, fits all iPhone and Android Cellphone even with a case. the phone holder with cold shoe let you to connect with microphone or LED light etc

【Sturdy & Portable】 Heavy duty aluminum and 2lbs weighted tripod base are combined to construct this stable and sturdy phone tripod stand. On the other hand, this tripod adopts the flip-locks structure, making it easily to be folded down to just 16.5 inches in seconds and capable of throwing in the car or side pack of a backpack

【Quick Installation & Foldable】the phone floor stand can be adjusted from 16.5 to 80 in, the quick-release lever-locks allow you to adjust the working height or fold in seconds. However, other products on the market use screw locking, which wastes a lot of time in height adjustment, installation, and fold, making us feel very uncomfortable. our tablet tripod only 16.5in fold size, convenient for storage and carry allows you to carry it to anywhere, party, indoor or outdoor filming

Flexible & Sturdy Gooseneck】The 16" gooseneck is made of thickened metal, it can be repeatedly bent without breaking, The max load-bearing capacity of up to 1KG, Easily support all smartphones on the market. the flexible gooseneck arm, which can be flexibly bent in any direction, ensuring that you can shoot at long distances and ultra-low angles.

【Multi usage】 the phoen tripod with gooeseneck is great for outdoor selfies, group photos, adventure travel, vlogging and YouTube videos, iPhone & Camera Live Video Recording Vlogging/Streaming/Photograp/overhead phone tripod for video recording

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Peastrex 80" Phone Tripod Video Stand with flexible gooseneck, it is Made of premium aluminum alloy, it can be freely extended from 16.5’’ to 80’’, you can use it both indoor and outdoor. Perfect for watching, photo, video recording, Online teaching, live Streaming

Flexible Gooseneck The 16" gooseneck is made of thickened metal, which can be flexibly bent in any direction, The max load-bearing capacity of up to 1KG Phone Holder The phone holder fits for 3.5 to 7 in cellphones with screen size, even with a case on. it come with two 1/4" thread, dual mounting option

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Get this stand you will not regret it. Very useful and easy to carry

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality tripod
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely love this easy to set up tripod! It has all the attachments and holds my phone perfectly!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars excellent camera phone tripod
reviews.reviewText: I was looking for a tripod and decided on this one for the stability of the base and flexibility of the goose neck. It works great. Well engineered. Great height range. Ideal for videos. Recommended.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very adjustable, very sturdy
reviews.reviewText: Easy to put together and adjust height-wise. Gooseneck adjusts smoothly and the base is stable enough to keep unit upright even with phone adjusted well over the side. Quick to fold up and put away. The section that holds the phone fits my large phone with a case and a large ring/stand on the back. I had to install an app to use the remote, and that is the reason for four stars instead of five. The app contains ads so you have to wait to get to the screen to take pictures. If you have a compatible phone you can just use your phone's camera app with the remote and I would highly recommend that instead. I like the adjustability of this and it is very convenient and far more comfortable to have your phone positioned on this instead of having to hold it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just what I needed
reviews.reviewText: Great tripod for your phone! I can record videos of products for my business much easier now. I only use it for this purpose but i'd imagine given it's flexible and durable, this would work for many other things and even outdoor use as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for Content creation
reviews.reviewText: I got this tripod for basketball games and filming in church. I like it because it can get shots from above and the gooseneck allows for great versatility. The legs are strong and stable. They cellphone holder is adjustable to fit most phones and the remote is a great addition. Good tripods are hard to find and this one is functional and comes in at a good price. I am pleased.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really cool tripod
reviews.reviewText: This tripod has HEIGHT. which is fantastic for tall people, but also fantastic for not so tall people, as the height can easily be adjusted. I had a tiny bit of trouble getting my iPhone 12 Pro Max to not make the tripod fall over, as it also has a pretty heavy duty case on it, but I just had to tighten the phone holder to it's limit. Overall, I love this tripod, and I'll definitely be using it for my future vlogging/IRL streaming ventures!
